Source code for maxairesources.utilities.tests.test_spark_distributor

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import sys

sys.path.append("/home/jovyan/max.ai.ds.core/")
import pytest
from unittest.mock import patch, MagicMock

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from maxairesources.utilities.spark_distributor import SparkDistributor
from pandas.testing import assert_frame_equal


[docs]class TestSparkDistributor(object):

[docs]    @classmethod
    def setup_class(cls):
        cls.spark = (
            SparkSession.builder.master("local[2]")
            .appName("gbt-classifier-test")
            .getOrCreate()
        )

        

[docs]    @classmethod   
    def load_sample_data(self):
        pandas_df = sns.load_dataset("tips").reset_index()
        spark_df = self.spark.createDataFrame(pandas_df)
        return pandas_df,spark_df

    

[docs]    @classmethod   
    def get_function(self,function_name):
        if function_name == "test1":
            def process_df(df,value,col_name="day_custom"):
                df[col_name] = df['day'].astype(str) +'_'+ df['time'].astype(str)
                df['size'] = df['size'] + value
                return df
            return process_df

        

[docs]    def test_function_1_test1(self):
        python_function = self.get_function("test1")
        pandas_df,spark_df = self.load_sample_data()

        value = 10
        expected_df = python_function(pandas_df,value)

        spk_dist = SparkDistributor(python_function,spark_df,value)
        spark_result_df = spk_dist.pandas_to_spark_wrapper()
        spark_result_df = spark_result_df.drop("spark_id")
        pandas_actual_df = spark_result_df.toPandas()

        pandas_actual_df = pandas_actual_df.sort_values("index").reset_index(drop=True)
        expected_df = expected_df.sort_values("index").reset_index(drop=True)
        expected_df = expected_df.astype(pandas_actual_df.dtypes.to_dict())
        assert_frame_equal(pandas_actual_df,expected_df)



[docs]    def test_function_1_test2(self):
        python_function = self.get_function("test1")
        pandas_df,spark_df = self.load_sample_data()

        value = 30
        col_name = "day_night"  
        expected_df = python_function(pandas_df,value,col_name)

        spk_dist = SparkDistributor(python_function,spark_df,value,col_name=col_name,sample_size=30,parallelism=10)
        spark_result_df = spk_dist.pandas_to_spark_wrapper()
        # spark_result_df = spark_result_df.drop("spark_id")
        pandas_actual_df = spark_result_df.toPandas()

        pandas_actual_df = pandas_actual_df.sort_values("index").reset_index(drop=True)
        expected_df = expected_df.sort_values("index").reset_index(drop=True)
        expected_df = expected_df.astype(pandas_actual_df.dtypes.to_dict())
        assert_frame_equal(pandas_actual_df,expected_df)

        

[docs]    @classmethod
    def teardown_class(cls):
        cls.spark.stop()
